column2: "Mennye m’enyiwa dzii ahyɛmu dɛ; Monnkɔhwɛ ɔbaabun"
"Na ebɛnadze nye Nyankopɔn ne kyɛfa a ofi sor
column3: Na Otumfo no n’egyapadze a ofi sorsor?"

column2: "Ana ɔnnyɛ mbusu mma brakyewnyi
column3: Na amandzehu so mma emumuyɛfo?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ɔno na ohu m’akwan
column3: Na ɔkan m’anamɔntutu nyinara?"

column2: "Sɛ medzi egyangyandze ekyir
column3: Na m’anan apɛ ntsɛm wɔ ndaadaa ho a;"

column2: "Wɔmma wonker me wɔ nokwar nsɛn mu
column3: Na Nyankopɔn bohu me tsenenee;"

column2: "Sɛ m’anamɔn adan efi kwan no do
column3: Na m’akoma dzi m’enyi ekyir nantsew
column4: Na sɛ nkekaa bi fam me nsa ho a:"

column2: "Ɔno dze
column3: wɔmma mundua
column6: wɔmma wontutu me haban mu ndɔbaa ngu."

column2: "Sɛ wɔadaadaa m’akoma akɔ ɔbaa bi ho
column3: Na makɛtsɛw me nyɛnko abowano a:"

column2: "Ɔno dze
column3: wɔmma me yer nyam mma obi
column4: Na obi so mbutuw no do."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔyɛ ewudzisɛm kɛse; Nyew
column3: ɔno na ɔyɛ emumuyɛ a ntsɛmbuafo tua ho kaw bɔn."

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔyɛ gya a ɔhyew kɔ Ɔsɛɛ mu
column3: Na nkyɛ obotutu mo ndɔbaa nyinara."

column2: "Sɛ mubuu m’akowaa anaa m’afonabaa asɛm enyimtsia
column3: Aber a wɔnye me kasakasae a:"

column2: "Ɔno ebɛnadze koraa na sɛ Nyankopɔn soɛr a mebɛyɛ? Na sɛ ɔbɛsera a
column3: ebɛn mbuae na medze mubobua no?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ nyia ɔyɛɛ me wɔ yafun mu no na ɔyɛɛ no? Ana nnyɛ obi na osinsiaan hɛn wɔ yafun mu?"
"Sɛ mesianka ehiafo efi hɔn ahwehwɛdze ho
column3: Anaa mama ɔbaa kunafo enyi ebu;"

column2: "Anaa monkotsee medzi mo trɔma
column3: Na egyanka enndzi mu bi a;"

column2: "Dabida
column3: ofi ne mbofraber mu na menyɛɛn no dɛ egya
column4: Na ofi ne na yamu na mayɛ no kwankyerɛfo;"

column2: "Sɛ mehu obi a tam abɔ no ntsi ma ɔrehera
column3: Anaadɛ ɔkɔhweaban dɛ onnyi akataho a;"

column2: "Na sɛ oennhyira me dɛ
column3: Mo nguan ho nhwi na ɔdze bɔɔ no hyew a
column5: "Sɛ mama me nsa do etsia egyanka
column6: Osiandɛ minyim dɛ mowɔ tum wɔ kuropon mu a:"

column2: "Ɔno dze
column3: wɔmma m’abatsir nhuan mfi abatsir biew no mu
column4: Na m’abasa mbubu mfi ne biew do."

column2: "Na amandzehu a ofi Nyankopɔn hɔ yɛɛ hu dze maa me
column3: Na ne kɛseyɛ ntsi
column4: menntum annyɛ ndzɛmba a ɔtse dɛm."

column2: "Sɛ sika na medze ayɛ m’enyidado
column3: Na mase sika mapa dɛ

column2: "Sɛ m’enyi gyee dɛ m’ahodze yɛɛ kɛse ntsi
column3: Na dɛ me nsa kaa no dodow ntsi;"

column2: "Sɛ mohwɛɛ ewia wɔ ber a ɔhyerɛnee
column3: Anaa bosoom dɛ ɔnam ne hyerɛn mu;"

column2: "Na sɛ wɔadaadaa m’akoma nsumaa mu
column3: Na m’ano afew me nsa ho a:"

column2: "Nna nkyɛ mibedzi ator akyerɛ Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ sor no
column3: Na iyi so yɛ emumuyɛ bi a atsɛmbuafo tua ho kaw."

column2: "Sɛ m’enyi gyee nyia okyir me no ne nsɛɛe ho
column3: Anaa memaa m’enyi gyee wɔ aber a mbusu too no a;"

column2: "Dabida
column3: mamma m’ano kwan ma ɔannyɛ bɔn
column4: Dɛ medze ndom mibebisa no nkwa."

column2: "Sɛ m’asesee mu nyimpa annse dɛ
column3: Woana na obotum ehu obi a ne nam ammee no?"

column2: "Ɔhɔho biara annsoɛ abɔntsen do; Osiandɛ mubuebuee mo mbobow maa kwantsennyi;"
"Sɛ mekataa me mbrato do dɛ Adam
column3: Dɛ medze m’emumuyɛ sumaa mo bo mu;"

column2: "Osiandɛ musuroo nyimpadodow kɛse no ntsi
column3: Na ebusua ebusua enyimtsiabu yii me hu

column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ meenya obi a obetsie me: Hwɛ
column3: me nsewhyɛdze nye yi
column4: wɔmma Otumfo no mbua me; Na nkyɛ me nsa nka odunwoma  no a me tamfo no akyerɛw no!"
column5: " #31.35 ODUNWOMA: Nwoma a wɔakyerɛw sombo a wɔdze abɔ obi wɔ mu."

column2: "Ampaara nkyɛ medze bɔto me batsir do; Nkyɛ medze bɛkyekyer moho dɛ abɔtsir."
"Nkyɛ mebɛka m’anamɔn no dodow akyerɛ no; Nkyɛ mobɔtwe epin no dɛ ɔhenba."
"Sɛ m’asaase tseatsea mu tsia me
column3: Na n’akɔfi ka bɔ mu su a;"

column2: "Sɛ midzii n’aba bi a menntua kaw
column3: Anaa mama no wuranom ahwer hɔn nkwa a:"

column2: "Wɔmma nsoɛ mfifir nhyɛ ewifua ananmu
column3: Na nkyɛkyɛr nhyɛ atoko ananmu. Job ne nsɛm no abɔ adze."
